TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit QualificationDataItem extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示由管線區段開發人員所提供的資訊，以供主應用程式使用。

span.span: Represents information supplied by the developer of a pipeline segment, for use by the host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已套用至管線區段中使用的名稱/值組所組成的限定性條件資料的每個項目屬性，提供符合的區段 （例如，區段的建議的隔離等級） 使用的資訊。Each item of qualification data consists of a name/value pair that was applied to a pipeline segment by using the attribute, to provide information that qualifies the use of the segment (for example, the recommended isolation level for the segment). 結構包含一個名稱/值組和它所套用的管線區段的類型。The structure contains one name/value pair and the type of pipeline segment it was applied to. 使用屬性來取得包含字典的巢狀的集結構與相關聯的管線區段。Use the property to get a nested set of dictionaries that contains structures for the pipeline segments associated with an . 或者，使用方法來取得列舉值管線區段的結構相關聯的語彙基元或只是使用`foreach`陳述式 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中`for each`Visual c + +) 到如同一般的集合，將語彙基元結構。Alternatively, use the method to get an enumerator for the structures of the pipeline segments associated with a token, or simply use a `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in Visual C++) to treat the token as if it were a collection of structures. ## Examples 下列範例會列出每個相關聯的管線區段的限定性條件資料語彙基元的集合中。The following example lists the qualification data for the pipeline segments associated with each in a collection of tokens. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#12)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#12)]

returns.span: 如果 等於目前的執行個體，則為 ，否則為 。

value.span: 限定性條件資料項目的名稱。

span.span: The name of the qualification data item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已套用至管線區段中使用的名稱/值組所組成的限定性條件資料的每個項目屬性，來提供資訊給取用者的增益集。Each item of qualification data consists of a name/value pair that was applied to a pipeline segment by using the attribute, to provide information to consumers of the add-in. 屬性會取得名稱。The property gets the name. 使用屬性取得的值。Use the property to get the value. ## Examples 下列範例會列出每個相關聯的管線區段的限定性條件資料語彙基元的集合中。The following example lists the qualification data for the pipeline segments associated with each in a collection of tokens. 屬性用來顯示每個項目的名稱。The property is used to display the name of each item. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#12)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#12)]

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會識別限定性條件資料項目所套用的管線區段。

span.span: Gets a value that identifies the pipeline segment the qualification data item was applied to.

value.span: 資料項目所套用的管線區段類型。

span.span: The kind of pipeline segment the data item was applied to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您列舉資料限定性條件時，請使用這個屬性來識別屬於管線的特定區段的限定性條件資料。When you enumerate qualification data, use this property to identify the qualification data that belongs to a particular segment of the pipeline. > [!NOTE] > 增益集模型不使用限定性條件套用到主機的檢視增益集的資料。The add-in model does not use qualification data that is applied to the host view of the add-in. 如此一來，當您列舉限定性條件資料，您將找不到任何項目其屬性是。As a result, when you enumerate qualification data you will not find any items whose property is . ## Examples 下列範例會列出每個相關聯的管線區段的限定性條件資料語彙基元的集合中。The following example lists the qualification data for the pipeline segments associated with each in a collection of tokens. 屬性用來顯示的區段種類。The property is used to display the kind of segment. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#12)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#12)]
